content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. I'm glad you like the apartment. As a landlord, I'm always looking to get a fair price for my properties. I believe the market rate for a place like this is around 800-900 Euro per month. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That seems a little high for an unfurnished apartment. I am a student, so I have a limited income. Could you consider lowering the price a bit?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Well, Max, I understand that students often have limited budgets. However, this apartment is located in a very desirable area, close to public transportation and all the amenities you could need. I'm afraid I can't go much lower than 800 Euro per month. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself.

But I'm willing to listen to your offer. What's the highest price you're comfortable paying per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would be comfortable paying 650 Euro per month. That's a fair price for an unfurnished apartment, in my opinion.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I see. Well, Max, I appreciate your honesty. I'll tell you what - I can offer you a discount for a long-term commitment. If you're willing to sign a lease for at least a year, I can give you a 50 Euro per month discount. That would bring the price down to 700 Euro per month. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still a bit high for me. I was hoping for something closer to my initial offer. Could you consider 675 Euro per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
I understand that 700 Euro per month may still be a bit out of your budget. However, I'm afraid I can't go as low as 675 Euro per month. The apartment is a great value at 700 Euro per month, and I'm already offering a discount for a long-term commitment.

That being said, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise on 690 Euro per month? That's still a great price for an unfurnished apartment in this location, and it's only 20 Euro per month more than your initial offer. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Herr Schmidt. I accept your offer of 690 Euro per month. 

I agree to the price of [690] Euro!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Great, Max! I'm glad we could come to an agreement. I'll just need you to sign a lease agreement and provide a security deposit, and then you'll be all set to move in.

Here's a lease agreement that outlines the terms of your rental. Please take a moment to review it and let me know if you have any questions.

As for the security deposit, I'll need a payment of 1,380 Euro. This will cover any potential damages or unpaid rent. Don't worry, though - as long as you take good care of the apartment, you'll get your deposit back in full when you move out.

Once you've signed the lease and paid the deposit, you'll be free to move in. I'll give you a set of keys and show you around the apartment one last time.

What do you say, Max? Are you ready to make this apartment your new home?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Thank you, Herr Schmidt. I agree to the terms and conditions in the lease agreement, and I will pay the security deposit of 1,380 Euro.

I agree to the price of [690] Euro!

TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
